# patientName

**Instance Property**

The patient’s name.

## Declaration

```swift
var patientName: String { get }
```

## Discussion

HealthKit automatically extracts the patient’s name from the CDA’s XML data.

## Accessing the Document’s Data

- **authorName**: The document’s author.
- **custodianName**: The name of the organization responsible for the document.
- **documentData**: The CDA document stored as XML data.
- **title**: The document’s title.

items.description: The name of the organization responsible for the document.
items.name: custodianName

items.description: The CDA document stored as XML data.
items.name: documentData

title: patientName
